name: Live Cartoon's "Ashley's Boutique" DEMO
description:
Welcome to "Ashley's Boutique" a Live Cartoons production. Follow "Barry Laffer" and his adventure into a clothes botique where he meet several horny women.

This is a demo of a singel costume amonge the 89 costumes You can choose from.

In version 1.0 it is not any X-rated action, but suggestions and mature language. A introduction to an adult novel system created in a 2D envoronment with a 3D isometric view. The software is still under development and it is still more clothes to come.

Note: Software is hardcoded to use the directory C:\Games\AB If this path is altered the software will not work properly. If you need to have another path (i.e. D:\Games) please let me know at my Pateron page and I can provide an alternate installation with the new path. Remember it might take a week until a new installation file can be fisnish.

The software use a file to check it self. This file have on my antivirus (Avast) been consider as a possible virus. 

See https://oracle1990.itch.io/live-cartoons-ashleys-boutique for version 0.9, that are still missing 9 costumes.
